channel.title: A small question
channel.description:
Hey guys, I have a client and source, and I was just wondering whether it s possible to combine run client and run server together, so i don't have to go in and out of folders to start my server...
If there is actually a way, and anyone knows how, i would really appreciate their help.
Thanks ~ Ziege Terra ~
